description: Adds a new column to an existing datatable.

input.name: data
input.description: A datatable to which the new column will be added.

input.name: column
input.description: The name of the new column to be added.

input.name: value
input.description:
A value to be added to the column cells.
If unspecified, empty values will be added.

output.name: data
output.description: A new datatable with target column added.
